body:
Hey guys! As one of your Facebook Admins, I decided to make a thread letting you know about our Social Media.

Facebook - Updates on Development, Staff Applications, Events and more! Also, we have Fan Fic Friday! Basicly every Friday we'll post the newest chapters of the FanFics from our community.  Currently we have 3 FanFics going on:
"Golden War" by Excellence: https://avicus.net/forums/5d38602e5
"yet another story" by timaeusTestified: https://avicus.net/forums/eb9debc67
and
"Mercy" by FrostedCupcakez: https://avicus.net/forums/d920395d9
"A Glimpse of Hope Itself" by FrozenSolstice: https://avicus.net/forums/ba4b66824
If you want your Fan Fiction to be published on the Avicus Network Facebook page then send us a message or leave a comment!
And if you like the FanFics, check them out over the links provided and drop a Like on here!
We will also provide a weekly update on which submitted maps have been accepted.
Managed by Kylo, resepignev and JustALittleMagic

Twitter - Mostly updates about whatever Kylo is doing with the server whether it is a new update, or a tournament!
Managed by Kylo
